forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
